GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Application
APP_DATE.instruction:
Enter the date of application in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '25-12-2023'

EMAIL_ID.title: E-Mail ID
EMAIL_ID.instruction:
Enter your valid email address.
Example: 'rahul.singh@email.com'

APPLICANT_TYPE.title: Applicant Type
APPLICANT_TYPE.instruction:
Tick ONE box to indicate your role.
Options: 'Applicant' (Main Borrower), 'Co-Applicant' (Joint Borrower), or 'Guarantor'.

APPLICANT_NAME.title: Applicant Name
APPLICANT_NAME.instruction:
Enter your full name exactly as it appears on your ID proof.
Example: 'VIKRAM SINGH RATHORE'

DOB.title: Date of Birth
DOB.instruction:
Enter your Date of Birth in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '15-08-1990'

MOTHER_NAME.title: Mother's Name
MOTHER_NAME.instruction:
Enter your mother's full legal name.
Example: 'SAVITA DEVI'

FATHER_NAME.title: Father's Name
FATHER_NAME.instruction:
Enter your father's full name.
Example: 'RAJENDER SINGH'

SPOUSE_NAME.title: Spouse's Name
SPOUSE_NAME.instruction:
If married, enter your spouse's name here.
Example: 'PRIYA SINGH'
rejections: Married status selected but Spouse name missing

ID_PROOF_PAN.title: PAN Card Number
ID_PROOF_PAN.instruction:
Enter your 10-character Permanent Account Number.
Example: 'ABCDE1234F'

ANNUAL_INCOME.title: Annual Gross Salary / Income
ANNUAL_INCOME.instruction:
Enter your total yearly income in Rupees.
Example: '4,50,000'

RESIDENTIAL_STATUS.title: Residential Status
RESIDENTIAL_STATUS.instruction: Tick your status: 'Resident Individual', 'Non Resident Indian', or 'Foreign National'.

PROPERTY_STATUS.title: Property Status
PROPERTY_STATUS.instruction: Tick the status of your current residence: 'Own', 'Rented', 'Company Provided', or 'Relative'.

CURRENT_ADDRESS.title: Current Residence Address
CURRENT_ADDRESS.instruction:
Enter your full current address including Flat No, Building, Street, City, and Pin Code.
Example: 'Flat 402, Lotus Apt, MG Road, Pune - 411001'

PERMANENT_ADDRESS.title: Permanent Residence Address
PERMANENT_ADDRESS.instruction: Enter your permanent address. If same as current, write 'SAME AS ABOVE'.

OFFICE_ADDRESS.title: Office / Business Address
OFFICE_ADDRESS.instruction:
Enter your full work address including Pin Code and Landline Number.
Example: 'Office 5, Tech Park, Whitefield, Bangalore - 560066'

JOB_TENURE_CURRENT.title: Years at Present Job/Business
JOB_TENURE_CURRENT.instruction:
Enter the number of years you have worked at your current company.
Example: '3 Years'

JOB_TENURE_PREVIOUS.title: Years at Previous Job
JOB_TENURE_PREVIOUS.instruction:
Enter the number of years worked at your previous job (if applicable).
Example: '2 Years'

RELATION_DIRECTOR.title: Relation to Director/Senior Officer
RELATION_DIRECTOR.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you are related to any Director or Senior Officer of IDFC Bank. Otherwise, tick 'No'.

PEP_STATUS.title: Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
PEP_STATUS.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you are a PEP (e.g., Politician, Govt Official). Tick 'No' otherwise.

BANK_NAME.title: Bank Name (Existing Account)
BANK_NAME.instruction:
Enter the name of your primary bank.
Example: 'HDFC BANK'

BANK_ACC_NO.title: Bank Account Number
BANK_ACC_NO.instruction:
Enter your main bank account number.
Example: '001122334455'

REFERENCE_1.title: Reference 1 Details
REFERENCE_1.instruction:
Provide details of a person not living with you: Name, Address, Relation, Mobile.
Example: 'AMIT KUMAR, COLLEAGUE, 9876500000'

VEHICLE_MODEL.title: Vehicle Model
VEHICLE_MODEL.instruction:
Enter the specific Two-Wheeler model you wish to purchase.
Example: 'HONDA ACTIVA 6G'

LOAN_AMOUNT_REQ.title: Loan Amount Required
LOAN_AMOUNT_REQ.instruction:
Enter the loan amount you are applying for in Rupees.
Example: '80,000'

LOAN_TENURE_REQ.title: Tenure (Months)
LOAN_TENURE_REQ.instruction:
Enter the number of months you want for repayment.
Example: '24'

SIGNATURE_APPLICANT.title: Applicant Signature
SIGNATURE_APPLICANT.instruction: Sign here to confirm all details are true.

DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.title: Supporting Documents
DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.instruction: PAN/Form 60, photo identity proof, address proof, income proof, and business proof (where applicable) must be submitted. Requirements may vary by scheme.
